parameters: Here, I got you something to eat.
It might help you get your strength back.
Oh how silly of me to not introduce myself!
I'm \c[22]\n[2]\c[0], and you're currently at my father's shop.
I found you almost unconscious in the forest, so I brought you here to rest.
What the hell was I doing in a forest?
When I found you...\.\! you\....\.\! you were\....\^
And where did I get\fi these\fi clothes from?
It was a perfect fit on you so\^

\{Why the hell am I even still here?
\}
I should be fighting Azrath and his ugly pet right now!
Clearly you've woken up from quite the dream.
What do you mean you've never heard of Azrath?
Do you live under a rock?
Well this is the town of \c[17]Kiliga\c[0],\! and I believe no one here has ever\^
How come I never heard of this town?
Well...\. we aren't really famous for anything.
I mean our \c[17]Allanite\c[0] trade is somewhat viable, but not that huge though.
Allanite? You guys still trade Allanite?
I thought Allanite trade ended long ago, ever since \c[17]Citrine\c[0] was invented.
And what do you mean Allanite trade ended. Its been going strong for quite some years now.
Okay clearly we're not at the same page here.
I'm going out to get some supplies!
Take care of the shop for me while I'm gone!
Woohoo! Now I can go look for \c[17]\i[647]Dinkleberries\c[0] again!
It's a very rare fruit that grows deep in \c[3]Glenn Woods\c[0]. I've been hunting it down for quite a while now.
Say you wouldn't mind helping me out a bit now would you?
After all, it might help you relax a bit.
(Well this girl did help me out quite a bit and offered some nice hospitality. Maybe a small favour wouldn't hurt...)
(But what about Azrath? What the hell is going on?)
(Okay calm down Leo, lets just relax and let time take its course)
You did help me out quite a bit too.
It'll be much easier with the two of us!
He doesn't like me going out into the forest so much.
Be careful though, the forest has become quite dangerous in recent times.
I don't know why, but the animals there suddenly started attacking anyone they see pass by.
Dad stopped allowing me to go there by myself ever since.
Heh, you don't know who you're talking to miss.
I'm \n[1], the strongest knight in all of \c[17]Valora\c[0]!
We're clearly not on the same page.
Well, if you just get me a sword, I'll be fine.
Well that's no biggie. This is an equipment shop after all!
Last thing I remember was fighting Azrath.
Then he awakened that monster and next thing I know I'm in this place.
Business hasn't been going well lately, so this is all I could find without dad noticing something's gone.
Uh\. Dad,\. I thought you were going to go out to get some supplies..
Oh! Um! Sir! I swear, this is not what it looks like!
You know, I've been thinking about this for a while now...
There's really no way for me to keep you held back forever.
I had become obsessed with trying to keep you safe, and had become blind to what it was that you wanted to do.
I understand what you want to say\..\.. there's plenty of questions you're looking to find answers to...
Sometimes you just have to let the bird spread its wings.
I apologise for my words yesterday. Do find it in your heart to forgive me.
It's fine, really. Given the circumstances, anyone would have reacted likewise.
If it's not too much trouble, I'd like to ask you for a favour.
Could you keep my daughter safe?
I'm not asking you to be her bodyguard or anything.
I'm just, you know, worried she might get herself in danger she can't handle.
I can fend for myself you know!
It's okay, I'm looking for some answers myself.
Besides, I have no idea where I am. I'm going to need some guidance myself.
I knew I saw a good man in you! I'm sure you'll make a great companion!
Take care of yourself when I'm gone!
Don't go worrying about me. You look after yourself, and don't give \n[1] here a hard time!
It's a locket your mother used to wear.
I'm sure she would have loved to see how it looks on you.
I'll keep it close to me at all times.
I've lost a lot in my life, but I try my best to accept things as they are.
\n[2] is the only thing I have left in my life,\. so\|
Please protect her with all you've got, for this old man's sake!
Don't you worry a bit sir!
You're talking to one of the finest warriors in the world!
Sorry, I didn't mean to startle you.
I was taking my leave, so thought I'd come and say goodbye.
Well, I don't want to be a burden to you guys anymore, and besides, I still have to figure out where I am and how I got here.
You seem to have dropped this.
Just like this? Leaving your worried dad just a single letter!
And who are you to tell me what to do!
I apologise, I didn't mean to...
Anyways, my dad would never allow me to go out on my own.
And just like you, I have my own questions I need answers to.
I see, I won't try to stop you then.
Wait what! Why all of a sudden?
I just, feel like, it's better for the both of us, if we work together.
We could, you know, achieve our goals easier.
Well I guess I do have no clue where I am but...
You'd trust me? A total stranger?
You've already helped me out once, haven't you?
It's a special potion made from \c[17]Dinkleberries\c[0]!
We got the Dinkleberries together, remember?
I could never have gotten it without your help!
I don't believe you're a total stranger \n[1].
You are now under the protection of Valora's greatest warrior!
I... Right... You have no idea what that is.
Let's just go before dad gets back!
I just had another of those dreams.
It's fine dear. Just remember, dreams are simply dreams.
I know, but, it keeps coming back every now and then.
It's because you keep thinking about it over and over.
Give it a rest, and it'll leave on its own.
Now loosen your head and have a good night's sleep.
"The A-Z Guide to Theoretical Sorcery - Vol II"
It's a fine collection of books. Most of these are related to
It's a fine collection of books. Most of these are related to
It's a fine collection of books. Most of these are related to
Now believed to be lost to history, theonism is an ancient ability possessed by special individuals.
It is believed to be an inborn trait that cannot be learned.
Those with theonic powers were known as theons.
Theons were believed to be able to absorb negative energy around them.
Hatred, anger, malevolence- all negative qualities seemed to disappear from people when they were around theons.
The theons themselves had a greater tolerance to negative energy than normal people to complement their theonic abilities.
How theonism came to an end is yet unknown.
The theons seem to have disappeared completely, and with it humanity has lost another valuable asset
A small bouquet of arema flowers decorate the table.
